name: Halfpipe: Sick or Suck
description:
[student project from 2016]

Halfpipe Sick or Suck is an arcade skateboarding game where you need to constantly land backflips to increase your sick streak. Easier said than done though.

Note: You can't make a jump and land without completing a flip.

Controls:
Left and Right arrows: Move left or right
Up arrow: Flip

Music and main character art are from the game OlliOlli.
